alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 10 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central South Carolina, including the following counties, Bamberg, Barnwell and Orangeburg. * WHEN...Until 730 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Holly Hill, Branchville, Bowman, Rivers Bridge State Park, Santee, Ehrhardt, Eutawville and Vance. - This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 97. Interstate 26 between mile markers 160 and 169. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
